content: The current time and date is Wed Jun 21 15:20:09 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
I attempted to fix the 'find_all' attribute error message by installing the alltrails package using the command "pip install --upgrade pip && pip install alltrails". The command returned a warning about running pip as the 'root' user and recommended using a virtual environment instead. It also returned an error message stating that there is no matching distribution found for alltrails.
